name: Robi
description:
Robi is a digital narrative game that is designed to guide middle schoolers through developing social and emotional learning skills. Middle schoolers are in need of innovative ways to learn how to handle their emotions and digital gameplay in Robi will create opportunities to visualize and discuss what it means to use such skills. 

Players control the Robi avatar. Robi has escaped from his home planet to  planet earth to try to prove to himeslef and other robots that humans aren't evil.  During each round of Robi, Robi meets a human who does not trust robots, and will instruct him to do something in an effort to persuade the human that Robi truly is good friend material, and eventually, allow Robi into their home. In this prototype, Robi meets Jamal. Will Robi be able to make friends with Jamal while avoiding being caught by other robots??
